title: Beautiful Home in Seascape Greens available in Sept!
posting_body: Beautiful 4 bedroom, 3 bath home in Seascape Greens for rent starting mid September.
Recently remodeled with new flooring, fireplace, dishwasher.
Huge 700 sq. foot deck ideal for enjoying a sunny day outside and entertaining.
Solar PV panels for electricity generation.
Stunning ocean views from the living room- this is the perfect home for beach lovers, telecommuters and outdoor enthusiasts alike.
Huge garage with recently installed Sheetrock - 700 sq feet, could be used as artist studio , gym, or media room if desired.
Close to Rio Del Mar Elementary and other great schools.
The house is directly part of the Seascape Greens community, which is walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, the Aptos Village Tennis Club (not to mention the beach!).
Additionally, all residents of the neighborhood get access to the large greenbelt connecting the houses- a perfect place for children and adults alike to play.
First month and deposit due on move in.
Rent includes biweekly landscaping fee as house needs to maintain garden per HOA regulations.
